author: nurfikri89
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a follow up of #46981. The following changes are made: 
- By default, JMENano does not need to recluster AK4 Gen jets but take `slimmedGenJets` directly with `pt > 5 GeV` cut. - - Fixed a bug concerning duplication of some `FatJetForJEC` branches. 
- Increase precision of jet `pt` and `mass`.
- Add jet composition branches for genjets.
- Define `SimpleGenJetFlatTableProducer` and use it for Gen jets in main Nano and JMENano.

#### PR validation:

- Event size increase from 5.95 kb/event to 6.10 kb/event. Tested with RunIII2024Summer24 private reMini TTto4Q sample.
- passes the usual runTheMatrix test: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` with the exception of a few workflows which failed because of missing relval input files.
- passes MiniAOD workflows: `runTheMatrix.py -i all --ibeos  -l 2500.021,2500.022,2500.023,2500.024,2500.031,2500.032,2500.033,2500.034`
title: [Nano, JMENano] Updates for V15
